lead_paragraph: A German-controlled Italian-language radio, reporting stiff resistance by the people of Naples to German forces, asserted yesterday that the Germans would take "pitiless" reprisal if Neapolitans persisted in "getting in their way in the fight against the Anglo-Americans."
abstract: Gers warn Naples pub on aiding Allies, stiff reprisals threatened
